ch.nolix.element.GUI

Class BorderWidgetStructure<BWS extends BorderWidgetStructure<BWS>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.nolix.core.entity2.Entity
      • ch.nolix.element.GUI.WidgetStructure<BWS>
        • ch.nolix.element.GUI.BackgroundWidgetStructure<BWS>
          • ch.nolix.element.GUI.BorderWidgetStructure<BWS>
  • Type Parameters:
    BWS - The type of a border widget structure.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConsoleStructure, SingleContainerStructure, StackStructure, TabContainerStructure, TextLineWidgetStructure

    public abstract class BorderWidgetStructure<BWS extends BorderWidgetStructure<BWS>>
extends BackgroundWidgetStructure<BWS>
    Author:
    Silvan Wyss
